TopicTitle: Craft Apo/Peri changing when under 23,315 meters altitude at Mun

Articles.Content: [Bug] Apo and Peri of craft in orbit of mun change when below ~23,315 or so meters. Slight changes noted above height, but markedly increase beneath that altitude. Link to video demonstrating issue.
That might be  future not a bug of the new physics engine. Moon orbits below 20k are affected by mascons, ( large gravitational anomalies with giant impact craters) Wikipedia
